heading: HR01470
0: A RESOLUTION HONORING AND REMEMBERING THE MEMBERS OF THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES (AFP) AND THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE (PNP) WHO MADE THE ULTIMATE SACRIFICE IN ORDER TO DEFEND AND RECOVER THE CITY OF MARAWI FROM THE MAUTE TERRORIST GROUP, AS WELL AS EXPRESSING THE PROFOUND CONDOLENCES OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO THEIR BEREAVED FAMILIES
status: Pending with the Committee on NATIONAL DEFENSE AND SECURITY since 2017-11-22
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01470
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION HONORING AND REMEMBERING THE MEMBERS OF THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES (AFP) AND THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE (PNP) WHO MADE THE ULTIMATE SACRIFICE IN ORDER TO DEFEND AND RECOVER THE CITY OF MARAWI FROM THE MAUTE TERRORIST GROUP, AS WELL AS EXPRESSING THE PROFOUND CONDOLENCES OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO THEIR BEREAVED FAMILIES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2017-11-22
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON NATIONAL DEFENSE AND SECURITY ON 2017-11-22
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY
